auston_singapore.description: Auston Institute of Management in Singapore offers accelerated engineering programs, providing high-quality and academically rigorous courses ranging from Diploma to degree levels.

programs.name: Bachelor of Engineering (Hons) in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
programs.overview: Focuses on the principles and applications of electrical and electronic engineering, covering areas such as circuit design, power systems, and telecommunications.
programs.summary: A 3-year engineering degree covering power systems, circuit design, and wireless communication.

academic: Diploma in a relevant field or equivalent qualifications

programs.name: Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Computer Security
programs.overview: Covers topics related to cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, and digital forensics, preparing students for careers in IT security.
programs.summary: A 3‑year degree focused on cybersecurity, covering network security, cryptography, digital forensics, and ethical hacking.

academic: Diploma in a relevant field or equivalent qualifications

programs.name: Bachelor of Engineering (Hons) in Mechanical Engineering
programs.overview: Focuses on the design, analysis, and manufacturing of mechanical systems, with subjects such as thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and materials science.
programs.summary: A 3‑year mechanical engineering program emphasizing thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, mechanical design, and materials science.

academic: Diploma in a relevant field or equivalent qualifications

scholarships.name: Matriculation Excellence Scholarship
scholarships.description: Awarded to outstanding Myanmar students who have passed the matriculation exam with high scores. This scholarship provides financial support to pursue Higher Diploma and Bachelor Degree programs.
eligibility: Passed matriculation exam with distinction or high GPA
benefits: Up to 10,000,000 MMK in scholarship value
scholarships.application_process: Apply via Auston Myanmar's scholarship portal with academic transcripts and supporting documents.

auston_myanmar.description: Auston College Myanmar specializes in IT and Business programs tailored for Myanmar's growing industries. It provides practical education and a pathway to globally recognized degrees.

campuses.address: Shop House 17-18, Junction Square, Kamaryut Township, Yangon 11041
No. (6/7), 107th Street, between 65th and 66th Streets, Chanmyatharzi Township, Mandalay

events.name: Engineering Online Trial Classes
events.description: Prospective students can participate in online trial classes to experience the engineering programs offered.

events.name: Educational Tours
events.description: High school students are invited to tour the campus and learn about the programs and facilities.

programs.name: Foundation
programs.overview: This program prepares students for university and professional success by equipping them with critical academic and professional skills.
programs.summary: A 1‑year foundation program building critical academic skills to prepare students for higher diploma or degree study.
career_prospects: Progression to Higher Diploma or Degree programs

programs.name: Higher Diploma in Engineering Technology
programs.overview: This program equips students with specialized skills in engineering, aligning with industry needs in Myanmar.
programs.summary: A 2‑year higher diploma focusing on electrical technology, digital circuits, and programming to prepare students for engineering roles.

academic: Foundation completed by a recognized university from Myanmar
english_proficiency: Wall Street English Level 6 proficiency (for direct entry to Higher Diploma Program)

programs.name: Higher Diploma in Infrastructure and Networks
programs.overview: This program focuses on system administration, infrastructure security, and next-gen networking.
programs.summary: A 2‑year higher diploma specializing in network infrastructure, virtualization, security, and emerging technologies.

academic: Foundation completed by a recognized university from Myanmar
english_proficiency: Wall Street English Level 6 proficiency (for direct entry to Higher Diploma Program)

programs.name: Higher Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
programs.overview: Provides core mechanical engineering skills, focusing on industrial robotics and automation.
programs.summary: A 2‑year higher diploma in mechanical engineering with emphasis on robotics, thermodynamics, and automation.

academic: Foundation completed by a recognized university from Myanmar
english_proficiency: Wall Street English Level 6 proficiency (for direct entry to Higher Diploma Program)

programs.name: Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Computer Networks
programs.overview: This degree focuses on building and securing essential network systems for global industries.
programs.summary: A 3‑year bachelor’s degree in computer networks, covering network security, database systems, and web development.

academic: Higher Diploma (relevant to the intended degree) completed by a recognized university

programs.name: Bachelor of Engineering (Hons) in Mechatronic and Autonomous Systems
programs.overview: This program integrates mechanical, electronic, and computer systems to prepare students for careers in automation and robotics.
programs.summary: A 3-year bachelor's degree focusing on mechatronics, automation, and robotics.

academic: Higher Diploma (relevant to the intended degree) completed by a recognized university

scholarships.name: Matriculation Excellence Scholarship
scholarships.description: Awarded to outstanding Myanmar students who have passed the matriculation exam with high scores. This scholarship provides financial support to pursue Higher Diploma and Bachelor Degree programs.
eligibility: Passed matriculation exam with distinction or high GPA
benefits: Up to 10,000,000 MMK in scholarship value
scholarships.application_process: Apply via Auston Myanmar's scholarship portal with academic transcripts and supporting documents.

ljmu.description: Liverpool John Moores University (LJMU) is a renowned public university in the United Kingdom, offering a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs with a focus on academic excellence and practical learning.

programs.name: BSc (Hons) in Computer Science
programs.overview: Provides a comprehensive understanding of computer science principles, including programming, algorithms, and software engineering.
programs.summary: A 3‑year computer science degree focusing on programming, algorithms, AI, and software engineering.

academic: A-levels or equivalent qualifications in a relevant field

programs.name: BEng (Hons) in Mechanical Engineering
programs.overview: Offers in-depth knowledge of mechanical engineering concepts, focusing on design, analysis, and manufacturing processes.
programs.summary: A 3‑year mechanical engineering program emphasizing engineering design, thermodynamics, and control systems.

academic: A-levels or equivalent qualifications in a relevant field

programs.name: MSc in Data Science
programs.overview: Equips students with advanced skills in data analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies.
programs.summary: A 1‑year master’s program in data science covering machine learning, big data technologies, and data visualization.

academic: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field

contact.address: Rodney House, 70 Mount Pleasant, Liverpool L3 5UX, United Kingdom
